content: Prabhaatha namaskaaram
Pattakkaaran:- shubaho
Janam:- balaheenarum paapikallumaaya…

items.content: Pattakkaaran:- daivamaaya kartthaave! Bhaagyamullllavayumprakaasham niranyirikkunnavayumaaya kathirukallaal nyanga llude kannukalle prakaashippikkaname. Marichavarude ida yilninnulllla ninte uyirtthezhunnelppudivasatthil nyangalle santoshippikkayum, ninte karthrthvatthinte udayatthaal nyangalle aanandippikkayum cheyyaname. Nyanga llude jeevante aashaabandhavum nyangallude aathmaakkallude rakshithaavumaaya mashihaa! Ninte krpaasahaayangallaal nyangalle thunaykkaname. Moraan vaalo haan laalmmeen. Aammeen.

content: Eniyono
(briku dhaadee lashamaayone)

Mahimayodakkabareennu pura-
Ppettee srshdikalle
Shobhippichoru shobhayathaam
Yeshu sthuthyanaho.

Shemaonum yohannaanum
Chennaa kabaringkal
Sthuthi paadi santoshattho-
De poyavar thirike.

Aazhchayilaadyatthethaayee-
Dunnee shuddhadine
Aadyajanuyir poondezhunnelppi-
Chee manmayareyum.

Konnavare jeevicheshu
Lajippichathinaal
Pallllikallum dayaraakallumi-
Nnaanandikkunnu,

Mrthar thannaathmaakkalluminnaa
Nandikkum krpayaam
Panineeravarmeluyir poondo-
Neshu veezhtthiyathaal.
Baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menaolam…

Rakshakane! Ninneyum nin
Uththhaanattheyum
Kondaadunnadiyaarkkuyire-
Kenam ninnarull pol.
Kuriyelaayisson.
Eniyono
(kolo dshubaho)

1. Daivamuyirtthu mahatthvatthodaadaamineyum than-
Makkalleyum jeevippichu.
Doothaganam thalpathi'ye vaazhtthi bhoomi villangi.
Bhramamodu kaavalkkaar ninnu.

2. Shemaonkeeppaa yohannaanodumonnichee naall
Akkabaridamathilekkodi.
Yaakkobaanandichu, thommaa thrpthippettu,
Matthaayi sthothram paadi

3. Paathaallam pukkidayan vigrahaseva vidartthi
Thannude sabhaye rakshichu
Jeevichu mahatthvatthodezhunnettathine shakthyaa
shathrukkallil ninnum veendu.

4. Veenyin lahariyozhinyavaneppol kartthaaveenaall
maranatthe vittunarvvode
Mrthiye konnu thakartthappaathaallatthin vaathil
Theertthoru nithyakkaalpeedham.

5. Daivamuyirtthu marichavareenninnezhunnettettam
Kaavalkkaaril bhramametti
mashihaa jeevichennavaroorshlem pukkaartthathinaal
Krooshichavar lajichettam.
Baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menolam ...

6. Nin varavortthu vasichu marichavar khinnare modi-
Ppikkum nin thejassathine
Kandinnedivasam thangallude thalakalluyartthi
Nin krpaye sthuthi cheyyunnu.
Kuriyelaayisson.
19-aam masumoor
/Taakaashangall daivatthinte mahatthvatthe ariyikku nnu. Aakaashatthattu avante kaivelaye kaanikkunnu; pakal pakalinu vaakkine ucharikkunnu, raathri raathrikku arivine ariyikkukayum cheyyunnu.

/tavayude shabdam kellkkappedaattha bhaashayumilla; vaakkukallumilla. Bhoomiyil ellaayidavum avayude ari yippum bhoolokatthinte athirtthikallollam avayude vacha nangallum purappettirikkunnuavan avayil suryante mel avante koodaaram adichu; athu thante manavarayilninnu purappedunna mana vaallan ennapole aakunnu. Paraakramamullllavan enna pole thante vazhi oduvaan santoshikkum.
/taakaashatthinte attangallilninnu athinte purappaadum, aakaashatthinte aruthikallinmel athinte thaangalum aakunnu. Athinte aaviyil ninnu maravaayirikkunnathu (onnum) illa.

/tkartthaavinte vedapramaanam kara illaatthathum, aathmaa vine thirikkunnathum aakunnu. Kartthaavinte saakshi vishvaasayogyavum shishukkalle jnyaanamullllavaraakku nnathum aakunnu. Kartthaavinte pramaanangall chovvalllla vayum, hrdayatthe santoshippikkunnavayum aakunnu. Kartthaavinte kalpana thiranyedukkappettathum, kannukalle prakaashippikkunnathum aakunnu.

/t kartthaavinekkurichulllla bhayam vedippullllathum, ennekkum nilanilkkunnathum aakunnu. Kartthaavinte nyaayavidhikall sathyamaayittullllavayum, sakalatthilum neethiyaayittullllavayum aakunnu. Ava svarnnatthekkaallum nalla rathnangallekkaallum aagrahikkatthakkavayum, theni nekkaallum thenkattayekkaallum maadhuryamullllavayum aakunnu.

/tathrayumalla thante daasan avayaal sookshikkappe dum. Avan avaye aacharichaal vallare prathiphalam kittum. Pizhakalle thirichariyunnavan aar? rahasyakaarya ngallil enne kuttamillaatthavanaakkittheerkkaname.

/tdushdanmaar ennil adhikaarappedaathirippaanum paapangallil ninnu nyaan vedippullllavanaayirippaanumaayittu anyaayangallilninnu ninte daasane thadayaname. Ente sahaayakkaaranum ente rakshithaavumaaya kartthaave! Ente vaayile vachanangall ninte ishdaprakaaravum, ente hrdayatthile dhyaanam ninte mumpaakeyum iri kkaname.
/tdaivame! Sthuthi ninakku yogyamaakunnu.
Baarekmor. Shubaho... Menolam...
Eniyono
(shamaayo mdeettho dmaalaake)

1. Mashihaa jeevichezhunnettu;
Kaavalkkaar lajappettu.
Than priyayaam sabha santosha-
Tthaalaathmapriyane vaazhtthum.

2. Nyaayardine keeppaa yoha-
Nnaanmaarotthodippoyi,
Guru mrthareennuyir poondette-
Nnathu kettaaraanyiduvaanaay.

3. Rakshakane! Ninnuththhaana-
Tthin dinamaaminnadiyaaril
Preethiyezhunnallavillaa kaa-
Runyatthaal pokkuka kuttam.

4. Dayaraakall pallllikallum sa-
Ntosham kaikkondinnaallil
puthran thannuththhaanatthe
Vaazhtthi sthothram paadunnu.
Baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menolam

5. Nashdamathaam thannuruvam vee-
Ndaadaammin jeernnashareeram
Puthuthaakkaanaayu mrthaloka-
Tthekkallo daivamirangi.
Kuriyelaayisson.

/Tkartthaavinu oru puthiya paattum, avante sthuthiye bhoomiyude athirtthikallilninnum paaduvin. Samudratthi lekku irangippokunnavarum, athilulllla sakalavum, dveepu kallum, avayil kudiyirikkunnavarume! (kartthaavinu paaduvin).

/tvanavum athile graamangallum santoshikkatte, kaador mechilsthhalangallaayirikkatte. Paarakallil kudi yirikkunnavar sthuthikkatte. Avar parvvathangallude muka llil ninnu aartthukollllatte. Kartthaavinu mahatthvam kodukkukayum, avante sthuthikalle dveepukallil ari yikkukayum cheyyatte.
/tkartthaavu paraakrami ennapole purappedum. Avan yoddhaavu ennapole vaashiye jvalippikkum. Avan aartthu prabalappettu thante shathrukkalle samharikkum.

/taakaashangalle! Melilninnu aanandippin, meghangall neethiye thallikkatte. Bhoomi thurakkappedatte. Raksha varddhikka tte. Neethi onnichu mullaykkumaaraakatte. Ivaye srshdicha kartthaavu nyaanaakunnu. Daivame! Sthuthi ninakku yogyamaakunnu.
Baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menaolam
Eniyono
(yaummono)

Innaall nin-kabaringkal doothanmaar poondum vellllangki
shishyakall nal dhoopasugandhakkoottukallodum poy,
Ariyichavare - maalaakha, than sthu-thyamuththhaanam.

Thiruvullamaayu mrthi poondakkabareenninguyirettu maanushare
veezhchayil ninnetti svargakkoottatthodukoode
Modippaan na-mme mellippicho-naayu sthothram.

Nyaayardine-doothanmaar vellllayaninyetthi kabararike
Avariloraall neekkiya kallinmeleriyirunnu
Akhileshan jee-vichennariyichaa-naarikalle.
Baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menaolam ...

Naathhaa! Nin-uththhaanam dootharkkinneku-nnaanandam
Ithu naarikall chonnarivaayathinaal shemaon keeppaa
Santoshikku-nnaanandikkunnaa-yohannaan.
Kuriyelaayisson.
Eniyono
(leku dkeeso)

1 than mrthiyaalazhakaake nashi-
Ppikkum maranatthe konni-
Ttaakalkkarusaa than keezhil
Ninnadiyaare veenda nina-
Kkuchithaddhvaniyil sthuthi paadu-
Nnadiyaarellaarum.
Baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menolam…

2 athula vishuddhasabhe! Praarththhi-
Ppaan nin makkalleyum kootti
Sleebaayaal rakshicha sutha-
Nnaayi sthothram paadiduka.
Uchithaddhvaniyil sthuthi paadu-
Nnadiyaarellaarum.
Aammeen
Eniyono
(sogedu loku moriyo)

1. Maanavar vaanor mun mun nin
mahimaye vandicheedunnu.
Karunaanidhiyaam nyangallude
Kartthaave! Sthuthyan neeye.

2 nyaayardinaminnuyaratthin
Dvaarangall' thurakkappettu.
Poozhiyil mrtharaayu meviyavar-
Kkullsharanamurappundaayi.

3. Moraaneesho! Ninnuththhaa-
Naal srshdikall modichellaam.
Mrthar nee avare kabarull poyu
Kandathinaal sthuthi cheyyunnu.
Baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menaolam

4. Ekasuthan thaanuyirpundi-
Parishuddhamathaam divasatthil
Mashihaa jeevicheedukayaal
man vinnulakukall modichu.
Mattoru eniyono
(lhau datthayeeno)

1. Yoodanmaar kurishil thookki,
Thanne kabarathil vachittum
Uththhaanatthaalullavaakum
Lajaashangkayavarkkundaay.
Haaleluyyaa u haaleluyyaa.

2. Seemaavaahi' paraakramiye
kabarull drohikall pootteettum
idivaall pole puratthaayu thaan,
Mudraykkillaathoru kedum.
haaleluyyaa u haaleluyyaa.

3. Naathhan villavaa velakkaa-
Rodu cho-dippaanaayu vannu.
Avakaashamamartthaanavane
Thoppin purame' avar thookki.
Haaleluyyaa u haaleluyyaa.
Baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menolam ...

4. Kaanaatthathine thedi than
Lokam naathhan pukkaare
Kabaril thanne adachavare
Lajippichuththhaanatthaal.
Haaleluyyaa u haaleluyyaa.
Kuriyelaayisson.
Matthaayi 5:3-12
/Taathmaavil daridraraayavar bhaagyavaanmaar; entu kondennaal svargaraajyam avarudethaakunnu.
/tduഃkhichirikkunnavar bhaagyavaanmaar; entukondennaal avar aashvaasappedum.
/tsaumyathayullllavar bhaagyavaanmaar; entukondennaal avar bhoomiye avakaashamaayi anubhavikkum.
/tneethikkaayi vishannu daahikkunnavar bhaagyavaanmaar entukondennaal avar thrptharaakum.
/tkarunayullllavar bhaagyavaanmaar; entukondennaal avarudemel karunayundaakum.
/thrdayashuddhiyullllavar bhaagyavaanmaar; entukondu nnaal avar daivatthe kaanum.
/tsamaadhaanam nadatthunnavar bhaagyavaanmaar; entukonda nnaal avar daivatthinte puthranmaarennu villikkappedum.
/tneethi nimitthamaayittu peedippikkappedunnavar bhaagyavaa nmaar; entukondennaal svargaraajyam avarudethaakunnu.
/tavar ningalle nindikkayum ningalle peedippikkayum ente nimittham sakala durvvachanattheyum ningallude nere vyaajamaayittu parayukayum cheyyumpoll ningall bhaagyavaanmaar.
/tningallude prathiphalam svargatthil varddhichirikka kondu ningall santoshichu aanandippin.
Baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menu olam
Eniyono
(esdakrain moriyo)

1. Naathhaa nin raajya-tthin mahimaagamane
Sleebaachirakaal-nyangalle moodikkollllaname.

2. Naathhaa! Nin raajya-tthin mahimaagamane
Nin parishuddha-nmaarodadiyaar cherename.

3. Innekasuthan than-uththhaane doothar
Sthreekallkkaanandam-santoshavumariyichu.

4. Naathhaa! Ninraajya-tthin mahimaagamane
Nin naamatthe- ettoru nyangalle elkkename.
Baarekmor.
Pattakkaaran:- shubaho veekkoro vsegttho vraa busayoyuso neshve dnaasekku laabo valabro valruho kaadeesho.
Janam:- menolam vaadaammolu olam olmmeenaammeen.

5. Naathhaa! Nin raajya-tthin mahimaagamane
Punyam nyangall-kkum nalkeedu marichorkkum.
Sthaumenkaalos. Kuriyelaayisson.

items.content: Pattakkaaran:- naam ellaavarum praarththhichu kartthaavinodu karunayum dayavum yaachikkanam.
Janam:- kaarunyavaanaaya kartthaave! Nyangallodu karuna cheythu nyangalle sahaayikkaname.
Pattakkaaran:- sthuthiyum sthothravum, praabhavavum puka zhchayum, maanyupokaattha nalla unnathiyum, ellaa pozhum sadaaneravum, idavidaathe karettuvaan nyangall yogyaraayittheeraname.

/tnaam thannodu apekshikkaathethanne, thante krpa moolam namme maranamillaatthavaraakkittheerppaanaayittu thiru vishdatthaal nammude adukkalekku varukayum, thante kashdaanubhavatthaal nammude kadacheettine keerikkallayukayum, maranamullllathaaya nammude vargatthinu thante uyirtthezhunnelpu moolam maranamillaayma saujanyamaayitharukayum, melullllavarkkum thaazheyullllavarkkum thante jeevichezhu nnelpu moolam santoshavum aanandavum daanam cheyyu kayum cheytha nalla udayavanu sthuthi. Prabhaathapraarththhana yude ee samayatthum, sakala perunnaallukallilum, nera ngallilum, naazhikakallilum, kaalangallilum, nyangallude aayushkkaalamokkeyilum, sthuthiyum, bahumaanavum, aaraadhanayum thanikku yogyamaakunnu. Bkulahan yaummoso dhaayain lolmmeen.

Pattakkaaran:- sakalatthinteyum srashdaavum nirmmaa thaavum shakthiparaakramangallodukoodiyirikkunnavanumaaya daivame! Ninte sneham moolam nyangallude rakshaykku vendi thiruvishdatthaal kashdaanubhavatthinum, marana tthinum sleebaaykkumaayi nee ezhunnalllli vannu. Shapikka ppetta janamaaya yahoodanmaaril ninnu aakshepavum nindayum parihaasavum sahichu. Nee nyaayaadhipathimaarude nyaayaa dhipathiyaayirikkumpoll naaduvaazhiyaaya peelaattho sinte mumpaake nilkkukayum dushpravrtthikkaaranum kuttakkaaranum ennapole adikallaal chodyamcheyyappe dukayum cheythu. Kuttakkaaranum heenanum ennapole nyaayasthhalatthu elpikkappettu. Athibhayabhakthiyodukoode kroobenmaarude puratthu aaghoshikkappedunnavanaayiri kkumpoll ninte thiruvishdatthaal nindayin sleebaa mel thookkappettu. Seeppaayil nagnanaayi tharaykkappettappoll sooryane athinte sthhalatthu andhakaarappedutthu kayum, nakshathrangalle avayude nirakallilninnu veezhi kkukayum, chandranu rakthaniram kodukkukayum cheythu ashuddhappettirunna vaayumandalatthe ninte thrkkaikall virichu shuddheekarichu. Kadhoramaaya ninte attahaasatthaal daivaalayatthinte thirashsheela cheentukayum, bhoomiye vira ppikkukayum, paarakall pollikkukayum, kabarukall thura kkukayum cheythu. Ninte paathaallapraveshanatthaal mara nattheyum saatthaaneyum kollukayum paathaallatthil undaayirunna marichavarkku sharanavum santoshavum jeevanum naashamillaaymayum prasamgikkukayum, paathaalla tthil bandhikkappettirunnavare azhichu vidukayum, paathaa llatthinte agaadhakkuzhiyil kidannirunna vilangukaare puratthirakkukayum, kabaril undaayirunnavarude kazhutthu kalle maruthalippukaaranaaya dushdanilninnu svaathantryappe dutthi rakshikkukayum cheythu. Sakala srshdikkum puthiya jeevan saujanyamaayi kodukkukayum lokatthe muzhuvanum nirappum samaadhaanavum manushyasnehavum kondu niraykkukayum cheythu. Jeevanteyum rakshayu deyum suvishesham prasamgippaanaayittu ninte vishuddha shleehanmaarodu kalpikkayum, Daivam kabarilninnu uyirtthezhunnettu ennum thante shathrukkall chitharippoyi ennum avar lokam okkeyum ariyikkukayum cheythu. Athinaal karunayullllavanaaya kartthaave rakshikkunnathum jeevanundaakkunnathumaaya ee ninte uyirtthezhunnelpu divasatthil, nyangall ninte krpa yodu apekshikkunnathentennaal, nyangalle maranami llaatthavarum naashamillaatthavarumaakkittheerkkaname. Aakshepakaravum nindaakaravumaaya sakala vikaarangallil ninnum nyangalle svaathantyappedutthaname. Sakala durvvikaaranga llodum ethirtthu nilkkunnathinu nyangall praaptharaa kuvaanaayittu jeevippikkunnathaaya ninte shakthiyaal nyangalle aayudham dharippikkaname. Aakalkkarusaayeyum avante sakala sainyangalleyum, ninnaal nyangall jayikkumaaraakaname. Nyangall ellaavarum ninte randaa matthe ezhunnallllatthine santoshatthodukoodi ethire lpaanaayittu nalla avasaanatthinum nirappulllla purappaa dinum yogyaraayittheeraname. Nyangallude kadangallum paapa ngallum nyangallodu kshamikkaname. Sathyavishvaasatthodu koode ninnil nidrapraapichirikkunna vishvaasikallaaya nyangallude marichupoyavare neetheekarichu bhaagyamulllla bhava nangallil avare aashvasippikkaname. Nyangall ninakkum, ninte pithaavinum, ninte vishuddha roohaaykkum, ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum sthuthiyum sthothravum kare ttum. Hosho

content: Pattakkaaran:- daivatthilninnu kadangallkku parihaaravum, paapangallkku mochanavum…
Janam:- aammeen.
Kolo
(enono nuharo)

Agnyaathmee-yanmaari-rerum
Doothanmaarum thee poondaar
Kaadeeshu kaa-deeshennaar-tthum ko-
Ndinnaakabaringkal vannu.
/tdaivam kabareennuththhaanam
/tcheythettam mahimaavode.
/tkaavalkkaar kandandhanmaa-
Raay, me-leenneerenmaare
Avar kandaayu mrthare pole.
Baarekmor. Shubaho ...

“mudraykki-lle sathyam-kede”-
Nnaaraayunnaachaaryanmaar.
Onnichu-ttharamathinavar-chonnaar
“mudraykkottum kedilla.
/tmrtharaayu nyangalleyaakkittheer
/ttthaashcharyam varuvin kaanmaan
/tnyangall svapnam kaanunno?"
Ennaa-lum Daivam kaattum
Sathyatthe maravaakkaamo?
Menolam…

Vaangippo-ya pithrkkall-kkum bhraa-
Thaakkallkkum nalkaashvaasam;
Ninnaaraa-dhakare nin-parishu-
Ddhanmaar samghatthil cherkka,
/tnee simhaasanamereettaa-
/tdushdanmaare neekkumpoll
/tavar nin kaarunyam kandu
Nin maa-haathmyamudikkumpoll
Valabhaagatthaayidenam.
Moriyo…

items.content: Pattakkaaran:- kartthaave! Ninte vishuddhashareeram pooshu vaanaayittu sugandhaparimallaadikallodukoode vanna paripaa kathayulllla sthreekalleppole sathkriyakallaakunna nallavasthrangallodum, kuttamillaattha nadapadikallaakunna mahima yulllla alangkaarangallodum koode sthothrangallaal nyangall thirumumpaake varumaaraakaname. Aa sthreekalle ppole nyangall ninne kandu aanandikkayum, ninte divyathyakkaalukall pidichu vandikkukayum cheyyumaaraaka name. Maallikayil vachu ninte shishyanmaarennapole ninte samaadhaanatthaal nyangall santoshichu aanandi kkayum, avarodukoode nyangall ninneyum, ninte pithaa vineyum, vishuddha roohaayeyum sthuthichu vandikkukayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Hosho aammeen.

content: Kolo
(loku moriyo korenaan)

1. Daivatthin puthrane mariyaamuththhaanatthin-
Shesham, thottakkaaran pol kandaall thottatthil
"neeyentinu karayunnaare aaraayunnu?”
Ennathi“nen naathhaneyavar ko-
Ndengo poyennaall."
/tthaanavalle “mariyaame”yennaan;
/todippoyudanavallariyichaall
Kartthaavuththhaanam cheythennaa shleehanmaare.
Baarekmor. Shubaho ... Haaleluyyaa
Haaleluyyaa menaolam

3. Than shuddhashareeram bhakshichum than raktham
Paanam cheythathum, mrtharaayor thannaathmaakkall mel
Azhiyaaloke paapatthinnirull vaazhaayvaan
Praarththhicheeduka naam mashihaa thannodavar perkkaayu
/tavaraathmaakkalle vaangiya naathhaa!
/tavar ninne kondaadiyathaale
Neeyavare villichu niruttheedaname valabhaage.
Evangeliyon
Pesgomo

Haale u haa ... U haa
Naathhanunarnnithurakkakkaaraneyum than
Veenyinlahari vedinyoru purushaneyum pole - haaleluyyaa
(evangeliyonu shesham)
Pothuvaaya dhoopapraarththhana
Kukkiliyon

Ninnaall sthuthiyodu raajamakall haale... U haa ...
Nin valamaayu raajabhaaminiyum.

Nayavaan panapole thallirtthidume haale...U haa ...
Vallarumavan lebanon kaarakil pol.

Makkallilappan krpa cheyathu pole haa...U haa...
Bhakthanmaaril Daivam krpa cheyyum.
Baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menolam…
Ekbo
(laaloho shubho braumme)

Sthuthi daivatthinnuyaratthil,
Than maathaavinnunnathiyum.
Mahimaamudi sahadenmaarkkum,
Mrtharil karunayumundaaka.
Sthaumenkaalosu kuriyelaayisson.
Kolo
(shlomme daabo menraummo)

1. Thaathan shlommo gabreeyel
Moolam meleennaa dhanya
/tmariyaaminu nalkappettu
/tthee poondon' vaayil thingum
Shlommo chonnaan naathhan nin
Koode thannudayam ninnil.
Baarekmor. Shubaho…

2. Shlommo! Than nibiyanmaarkkum
Shlommo! Than shleehanmaarkkum
/tshlommo! Shlommo naathhangkal
/tkurerum sahadenmaarkkum
Shlommo than makkall vasikkum
Parishuddhasabhaykkum shlommo!
Menaolam…

3. Naam daivasuthanmaaraavaan
Aayushkaalatthil cholli-
/ttthannetthaathare orkkenam
/tnayavaanmaar punyappetto-
Ronnichekumavarkkaashvaa
Sam svarge puthran Daivam.
Moriyo…
Maar yaakkobinte bovuso

1. Uththhaanatthaal thansabhaye veendonaam puthraa!
Nin shaino nalki thanprajaye kaakkenam nee.

2. Chaave keezhaakki balavaan skeeppaa'yilurangi
Moonnaam naallilunarnnezhunnettaan balavaanaayi.

3. Ksheenam maari moonnu dinam me-vi kurishinmel
Ksheenichonadi kondu nashikkaathingezhunnettu.

4. Daavee-daam thaa-than than-varavi-ngane ka-ndappoll
Odi-chennaa-veenayu-maayi kampi mu-rukki.

5. Chonnaan “matthu ku-ranya-manuja-nnoppam-naathhan
Mithra-ngallkkaa-nandavumarikall'-kkaartthi'yumeki”

6. Vinman lokarkkaikyam nalkeedum shaino nin
Uththhaanatthaal nin sabhayil shaino nalkenam.
Kaumaa

Shuddhan nee aaloho! Haaleluyyaa
Shuddhan nee balavaane! Kuriyelaayison.
Shuddhan nee mrthiheenaa! Krooshettone krpa cheytheedaname+
(moonnu praavashyam)

Kartthaave! Krpa cheyyaname haaleluyyaa
Kartthaave! Krpa cheyu kanivaal kuriyelaayison
Kartthaave! Karmmaarththhanakalle-ettittavayaal krpa cheytheedaname.

Sthuthyan nee aaloho-haaleluyyaa
Sthuthyan nee srashdaave! Kuriyelaayison
sthuthyan nee paapikalladiyaaril-krpa cheytheedum mashihaa-raajaave! Baarekmor.+
Svargasthhanaaya nyangallude pithaave!...
Krpa niranya mariyame…
